description: This file defines an interface 'ILocalStore' for a local storage component, including pure virtual methods for opening, creating tables, setting limits, retrieving entries, removing entries, and adding entries. It also defines a smart pointer alias for the interface.

classes.name: ILocalStore
classes.description: An interface for a local storage system with methods to manage storage tables and entries.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens a local store at the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table in the store.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a limit on the number of entries in a table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieves the count of entries in a table, starting from a specific point, up to a maximum number.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Returns a vector of entries from a table, starting from a given point.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries between specified start and end indices in a table.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to a specified table.
